definition: to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

sentences.english: Barrows grow faster because the young boars can be castrated earlier.
sentences.chinese: 由於小公豬可早一些去勢，所以閹過以後長得更快。

sentences.english: Gebrelul et al:including male and female kids, the male were castrated within 5 days of age.
sentences.chinese: 仔羊爲雌雄混合，且雄性於5日齡內進行去勢。

sentences.english: Conclusions Estrdiol inhibits neointimal proliferation after the gonadectomy in rats undergoing carotid artery balloon injury.
sentences.chinese: 結論雌二醇能夠抑制去勢大鼠動脈損傷後內膜增殖。

sentences.english: The history of castration can be traced back to 1 100 B. C.
sentences.chinese: 去勢術在中國的歷史至少可上溯至公元前十一世紀。

sentences.english: They had the animal neutered some seven years back.
sentences.chinese: 他們約在七年之前將這家畜去勢。

sentences.english: Conclusions Bilateral orchiectomy for incidental prostatic carcinoma might improve the patients survival rate.
sentences.chinese: 結論對偶發前列腺癌去勢術可提高生存率。

sentences.english: An ox is a bull that has been castrated.
sentences.chinese: 閹牛是一隻去勢的公牛。

sentences.english: Methods Castration was performed on 8 patients with prostate cancer, followed by flutamide treatment.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討去勢手術加緩退瘤治療前列腺癌的效果。

sentences.english: Clean all castration tools after use.
sentences.chinese: 使用之後清洗所有的去勢工具。

sentences.english: The diagnosis was obtained and then treatment of castration and anti-androgen or radiotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 確診後行去勢以及抗雄性激素藥物治療或加放射治療。

sentences.english: In intact males castration and scrotal ablation must accompany this procedure.
sentences.chinese: 未去勢之公畜需同時進行去勢及陰囊切除。

sentences.english: In intact males castration and scrotal ablation must accompany this procedure.
sentences.chinese: 未去勢之公畜需同時進行去勢及陰囊切除。

sentences.english: The most chilling and vivid display room shows the actual process of castration.
sentences.chinese: 最令人膽顫而生動鮮明的展室呈現了去勢的真實過程。

definition: (medical) compensation/to repay a debt or obligation in place of someone else
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
to rely on/to base oneself on
